attributes.action: Minimum payment of 15 pound per hour wages for Hospitality business
attributes.additional_details: To be mandatory as a low
attributes.background: To rise case and to be official

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

The Government sets the national minimum wage, which applies to all workers, but decisions about pay for people in particular sectors are a matter for their employers, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

National minimum wage to £15 to help working families as inflation rises: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/622490
